articles.description: Cars News: A host of mass-market cars are now offered with a single-pane electric sunroof, however, larger dual-pane 'panoramic' sunroofs are still only offered

articles.title: As Bajaj Finance continues sinking, Jefferies finds it perfectly priced - Economic Times
articles.description: The stock is a proven multibagger and has delivered 6 fold returns in the last five years.
articles.content:
NEW DELHI: Initiating coverage on non-banking financial company Bajaj Finance, Jefferies India termed it as best of both worlds but said it was perfectly priced. It rated the stock hold.

articles.description: The company claims to have delivered almost 7,000 units in February
articles.content: Bhavish Aggarwal, Co-founder of Ola Electric, has tweeted that the company has delivered almost 7,000 Ola S1s in February. He also revealed that the startup intends to deliver 15,000 units this month… [+682 chars]
